playing_short_pips.probleme: Playing Against a Short Pips Player
causes_communes: Inverted players often don't know how to play them

debutant.nom: Keep the ball deep on the table
debutant.description: Makes things difficult for the short pips player, gives you more time to react

intermediaire.nom: Don't take on a short pips player in a battle of quickness
intermediaire.description: Find your comfort zone, close to the table as you are comfortable and consistent

avance.nom: Remember that their blocks and hits are deader than you expect
avance.description: Adjust your loops and drives slightly higher, use a bit more force to generate topspin

exercices_complementaires.nom: Loop into the net and then think of the short pips block as a very quick push without much spin
exercices_complementaires.description: Adjust your stroke to generate topspin, or just go with less spin but control the ball deep on the table

exercices_complementaires.nom: Loop off the end and adjust to lift a dropping ball
exercices_complementaires.description: Over-react less, use a bit more force to generate topspin

metriques_progression.target: Play against short pips players every chance you can, adjust to their serves and pushes

erreurs_a_eviter.erreur: Expecting too much spin from short pips serves and pushes
erreurs_a_eviter.correction: Adjust your reaction to less spin, play against them more often to become comfortable
